meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the June 12, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize the ratification of a service contract for emergency repairs and modernization of the four elevators within the Hall Arts Garage
agenda_items.description: K & M Elevator, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $755,980.00 - Financing: Capital Construction Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Juanita Rodriguez v. The City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $35,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Jose Posada v. City of Dallas, Texas
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $130,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize the acceptance of a grant from the Texas Veterans Commission
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $50,000.00 for continuation of the South Oak Cliff Community Court

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the selection of an underwriting syndicate for the issuance of bonds
agenda_items.description: Financing: No cost consideration to the City

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the execution of the First Amendment to Revolving Credit Agreement
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $278,000 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $71,000 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Stormwater Drainage Management Fund

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds, Series 2024B
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $250,000 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Stormwater Drainage Management Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize the acceptance of a loan from the Texas Water Development Board
agenda_items.description: Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City

financial_items.description: Service contract for emergency repairs and modernization of elevators
Settlement of lawsuit Juanita Rodriguez v. The City of Dallas
Settlement of lawsuit Jose Posada v. City of Dallas, Texas
